transcript:
Jane Smith: Hi Kevin, this is Jane Smith from InfiniMeld. How are you today?

Kevin Murphy: Hi Jane, I'm good, thanks. How about you?

Jane Smith: I'm good, thanks for asking. So, um, we're supposed to talk about cloud services, right?

Kevin Murphy: Yeah, I think that's what we discussed initially. 

Jane Smith: Okay, um, where do you wanna start?

Kevin Murphy: Well, I guess maybe introductions? Or, I don't know. I mean, we've spoken before, so...

Jane Smith: Yeah, yeah. So, like, um, I guess you guys are looking for data warehouse solutions in the cloud?

Kevin Murphy: Yes, exactly. I remember you saying InfiniMeld does that, right?

Jane Smith: Oh, yeah, we totally do that. So, what are your like, um, main concerns?

Kevin Murphy: Hmm... probably cost, maybe security, and I guess, uh, scalability. 

Jane Smith: Oh, okay. So, like, what are you guys currently using?

Kevin Murphy: We have some sort of hybrid setup. It's kinda old though.

Jane Smith: Uh-huh. So, um, what kind of data are you working with?

Kevin Murphy: Well, we have a mix, like, customer data, internal metrics, transaction logs, stuff like that.

Jane Smith: Got it. So, you're looking to, um, move all that to the cloud?

Kevin Murphy: Yeah, but maybe not all at once. 

Jane Smith: Right, uh, that's smarter maybe. So, uh, what’s your timeframe for this?

Kevin Murphy: Yeah, that's the tricky part. We don't really have a set schedule yet.

Jane Smith: Ah, okay. Well, um, what’s your budget?

Kevin Murphy: It's kinda flexible, I mean, we don't want to go overboard but we understand we need to invest.

Jane Smith: Uh-huh. So, uh, how big is your team?

Kevin Murphy: We have a data team of... uh, let me see, about 10 people.

Jane Smith: Right, okay. So, um, are there any specific features you, like, need?

Kevin Murphy: Well, ease of use would be good. Also, integration with our existing systems would be ideal.

Jane Smith: Got it. So, you’re, like, looking for, um, a smooth transition?

Kevin Murphy: Yes, a smooth transition would be great.

Jane Smith: Okay, um, let me think. So, does your team have, like, cloud experience?

Kevin Murphy: Somewhat, but not extensively. We'd probably need some training.

Jane Smith: Um, we could, like, provide some training. So, do you, like, have a preferred cloud provider?

Kevin Murphy: Not necessarily. We're open to suggestions.

Jane Smith: Okay, well, uh, we work with, like, different providers. Um, what’s like, your top priority?

Kevin Murphy: Security, I would say.

Jane Smith: Right, security is, um, super important. We have, like, really good security.

Kevin Murphy: That's good to hear. Can you give me more details?

Jane Smith: Uh, yeah, it's like, um, really robust. We use encryption and stuff.

Kevin Murphy: Okay, but I mean specifics, like what kind of encryption or compliance standards?

Jane Smith: Uh, well, I think it’s, um, like AES and, um, we follow some compliance things.

Kevin Murphy: Alright, can you confirm those details?

Jane Smith: Sure, I can, like, email them to you.

Kevin Murphy: That would be helpful. Thanks.

Jane Smith: Yeah, no problem. So, um, anything else you need to know?

Kevin Murphy: Maybe, how will the migration process be handled?

Jane Smith: Uh, our team will, like, help yours to move the data.

Kevin Murphy: Okay, but is there a step-by-step plan or something?

Jane Smith: Uh, we have, like, a general plan. I can send you some info on that.

Kevin Murphy: That would be good. Also, who will be the point of contact throughout this?

Jane Smith: Um, probably me. Or someone else from my team.

Kevin Murphy: Alright, it’s good to know who I'm dealing with.

Jane Smith: Yeah, totally. So, uh, any other questions?

Kevin Murphy: I think, uh, not right now. Just send over the details we talked about.

Jane Smith: Will do. So, should we, um, schedule a follow-up call?

Kevin Murphy: Yeah, let's do that. Maybe next week?

Jane Smith: Sure, I'll, like, send over some times.

Kevin Murphy: Great, that works.

Jane Smith: Okay, well, it was nice talking to you, Kevin.

Kevin Murphy: You too, Jane. Talk soon.

Jane Smith: Bye.

Kevin Murphy: Bye.
